text: (born December 27, 1974) is a Japanese and American actor and digital effects artist. He is best known for his role as Hiro Nakamura on NBC's Heroes (2006â€“10). Oka was born in Tokyo, Japan. He moved to Los Angeles, California at a young age, before he settled in New York City, New York.
